title: Tundra Technical Solutions

slug: tundra_technical_solutions

images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $2.5M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Tundra Technical Solutions. The average
  contract duration was 0.95 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $256.3K. The longest
  contract was 3 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $3.0M.
lookup_name: 'TUNDRA TECHNICAL SOLUTIONS'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '2.5M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '53'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '26'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '49%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '97%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1.96'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '3.9M'
s424_mean_duration: '0.95'
s421_mean_contract_value: '256.3K'
s425_max_duration: '3'
s422_max_contract_value: '3.0M'
---
